title: Software Developer
description: - Designed, developed, and deployed responsive mobile and web applications to address real-world needs for personal, family, and small business-use cases.
- Collaborated with end users to gather and document requirements, and translated feedback into technical specifications and user-focused features.
- Utilized React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase to build scalable full-stack solutions, applying best practices in code structure, testing, and deployment.
- Handled post-deployment maintenance, including debugging in VSCode, optimizing performance, and adding new features to improve usability and functionality.

title: Software Developer
description: - Assisted in the implementation of a digital portal application for a property and casualty insurance company, contributing to improved internal processing efficiency and customer satisfaction.

- Collaborated in an Agile development environment, participating in Scrum meetings and iterative development cycles to ensure timely delivery of project milestones. Utilized SharePoint to manage deliverables.
- Utilized React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL to design responsive, scalable solutions that improved system usability and customer satisfaction.
- Utilized best practices and standards as defined by the product company.

title: Python Tutor
description: - Tutored first-year Michigan State University students in foundational Python programming concepts.
- Conducted personalized one-on-one and small group sessions to reinforce understanding of coding principles and problem-solving strategies.
- Developed custom examples and exercises covering topics such as class creation, function design, data structures, and string manipulation.
- Managed and organized weekly tutoring schedules to accommodate student needs while maintaining consistent session quality and engagement.

title: Software Developer
description: - Collaborated with a team of four to design and develop Money Moves, a mobile-based web application for Ally Financial aimed at promoting financial literacy among over 11 million customers.
- Designed and implemented accessible, responsive UI/UX components using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, ensuring user engagement and inclusivity across devices.
- Gathered requirements from Ally Senior Software Team, translating them into functional modules such as mortgage and interest calculators and interactive course quizzes.
- Delivered structured business presentations to stakeholders, demonstrating design decisions, technical progress, and measurable outcomes.
